website_summaries.verdict: The best b-ball simulation is even better on the Xbox One.
cons: A few truly bizarre player faces

customer_reviews.title: Less than $10 and worth $60 like a new game
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed I missed the online features of this game, but it is still most entertaining than any current nba games. Story and gm modes are awesome and I have been playing for a week with no signs of slowing down
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Grandson say Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This product was given to my grandson, I hear he plays it most everyday. That is when he's on the system which is quite often. (Every day) Course his parents don't let the game or games interfere with his studies, but I know he loves this game, and NBA 2K14 which I also gave him. He loves sports and the XBox One. Service was even better then expected when we ordered thru Amazon. I believe they the postal service delivered it on a Sunday. We were expecting a Monday or Tuesday delivery. We also ordered the NBA 2K14 and the XBox One, along with the control charger base all in the same bundle.
customer_reviews.author: John sims

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad, but still NBA
customer_reviews.text: Ive written long reviews for good games, but this game is pretty bad. All i'll say is for an xbox one game, the graphics were AWEFUL! In the "campaign" mode, whenever a good player (such as lebron james) speaks to you, no sound comes out, they just move their mouth and theres sub titles on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ammunition99

customer_reviews.title: Visually amazing
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are stunning. I actually had someone walk buy and thought I was just watching an actual basketball game. Personally, I am still learning some of the controls and have not been very successful in mastering the moves to win many games. I am a very casual fan of basketball in real life so the real appeal of this for me was the availability of another multiplayer game and the visuals. It is a well executed product and I'm hoping to see more like this on the Xbox One in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST BASKETBALL GAME EVER BUT......
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best nba games ever but one problem when you tey to play games somedays you will get "This save requires an active connection to the 2k Sports servers" This wont allow you to play any games beside quick game. Some days this happens somedays it dont but if this didnt happen it would get a 5. I been playing nba 2k since the beginning of nba 2k and this has to be the best on the next gen I had this on xbox 360 firat and the graphics and everything is 10x better than any other NBA game just waiting on them to fiz their few minor issues
customer_reviews.author: Sed

customer_reviews.title: Okay/But lacking
customer_reviews.text: Game was okay, there really isn't anything more to say about it. Basketball isn't my number one favorite sport but I do enjoy watching it when there aren't any soccer games going on. I heard a lot of great things about this game and so I bought it with the expectation it would be great but honestly it was nothing special. I preferred 2K13 to this one any day.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I don't usually play very much Xbox, but I find myself going to sleep at 3am after I realize how long I've been stuck on this game. It's not the easiest game because you start with a crappy player with minimal skill, so as you progress, learn and he gets better, you want to play more.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A Must buy for an NBA fan
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game for the Xbox One. The player visuals are outstanding and the game play is smooth and straight forward. My son have spent hours playing this already, and we both really enjoy it. The only thing that was a bit unintuitive was getting two player mode to work. Hint - both players MUST be signed into an Xbox profile on the Xbox One in order to enable a true multi-player 1 on 1 game.
customer_reviews.author: CashCarStar

customer_reviews.title: Great NBA game.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are beautiful and we're a nice introduction to the Xbox One. Gameplay is great, I usually play single player because most people that play multiplayer are vets to the NBA games. If you like sports games, this one is worthwhile. Only downside is it will be outdated in less than a year when NBA2k15 comes out.
customer_reviews.author: kstamp

customer_reviews.title: WOW.... sooorly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The game is pretty good for the most part. But playing it by yourself, with MyCareer mode, it's a total waste of time. Your grading is atrocious! Every little thing you don't do perfectly, you lose 3x as much as what you gain for doing something right. You make one freethrow you get 1 VC, you miss one, you lose one. Very greedy game and very poor one player game. VERY poor.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Game had an update when converted to Xbox one and the menus are now difficult to navigate and the game play is altered. Don't understand why you would change the game and call it the same thing just because its a system change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this game is awesome
customer_reviews.text: all I can say is that it is really freaking good. I haven't played this franchise in a bout 3 years so I have been really impressed. If you enjoy basketball then there is no other game to consider, this one is amazing. Imagine what 2K could do if the with the NFL if the stupid NFL didn't exclusively license their product to EA.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great game, TERRIBLE servers
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is awesome but the servers are horrible. You'll be in the middle of playing a game online and the game will just cut off. Doesn't matter how good your internet is either online games lag at times no matter what. Besides that though it's excellent, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Nasahr

customer_reviews.title: and get better, in order to have any fun
customer_reviews.text: Too much time to master all of the controls. I miss the older versions of this game (original Xbox) when it was fun\simple to play...now you have to really immerse yourself in this, and practice, and get better, in order to have any fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lallak

customer_reviews.title: The game itself is very fun. The process to get it going is awful
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is very fun. The process to get it going is awful. 2K asks for online registration constantly even tough we went through the process several times. It seems there's no way play even locally unless you get your oline regristration on.
customer_reviews.author: riktl

customer_reviews.title: Great game, decent graphics
customer_reviews.text: Great game, will provide you with endless hours of entertainment. Graphics are a little bit spotty, but thats not the most important part of the game and it is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ruscher

customer_reviews.title: he love it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this game for my Grandson, he love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NBA 2K13 was perfect on the 360
customer_reviews.text: NBA 2K13 was perfect on the 360. 2K14 on the Xbox One is pure garbage. Stressful loading times, diabetes inducing Sprite story mode promotes racist stereotype.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky from Queens

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more responsive
customer_reviews.text: I've played both the 360 and X1 versions of 2K14 and I have to say that I'm disappointed that the X1 version is not as responsive in as the 360 version. Players don't move as smoothly on the court. The gameplay just doesn't feel as dynamic as the 360 version. So even though the graphics on the X1 version are phenomenal, the gameplay doesn't match up, thus leaving you with a a feeling that they could have done better.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: NBA 2K14 Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son likes this game and plays it frequently on his Xbox One. The graphics are very nice and the game is well done.
customer_reviews.author: A. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great price with a great graphic's game
customer_reviews.text: This game is cool with better graphics and you can't beat the price too. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Rapsakoljagam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game if you can get your hands on it!!
customer_reviews.author: ALVY M.

customer_reviews.title: This should be easy to select TWO players while paying
customer_reviews.text: This should be easy to select TWO players while paying. There is no option of TWO players, which is very strange
customer_reviews.author: Shahid L.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game as a gift. person I bought it for seems to really enjoy playing. Would recommend to anyone who wants to order this game.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: That one day shipping is legit man 💯 the game was pretty awesome too I've had it before so i really wasn't worried about the game.
customer_reviews.author: Cash kid

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics! But error ridden!
customer_reviews.text: This game can be fun. When the game itself doesn't have its own errors that make it in enjoyable. Great graphics, realistic play for the most part. But there are countless issues with the game that can destroy your morale while playing. I really hope all of these technical errors are fixed for NBA 2K15!! Please!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Best NBA mycareer ever - definite upgrade over 2k13!
customer_reviews.text: First off i want to say that i only play career mode. I've been hooked on the 2k series since a buddy loaned me a copy of i think 2k10 and i discovered my career mode. Think of it as a basketball RPG where your play determines how you are awarded points to assign to various attributes. If you are a mycareer player that already has 2k13 i highly recommend the upgrade. Last years version felt as if you had to pay to win, this year the point earning is more evenly balanced and correlates to a more readily playable character. This is a must buy for 2k fans.
customer_reviews.author: Robbotron5k

customer_reviews.title: Great graphic and sound
customer_reviews.text: This is good game, shows the best of the Xbox One platform...gives real life performance and great sound systems. Recommended buy is you like playing these games.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not what my son was expecting it to be
customer_reviews.author: Neil H. Nitkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: This is the next gen game you want to show your friends to really showcase the power of the Xbox One. It looks and plays amazingly well. Highly recommend this game!
customer_reviews.author: Albert R. Myles Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's confusing.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter said this game is hard to figure out. It doesn't really explain how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. The game play is awesome. Gets a little repetitive when doing the season, but other than that I recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J

customer_reviews.title: nice game
customer_reviews.text: i bought this nba 2k14 game for my son and he loves it. he is playing this game every night.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: NBA2K14
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Love the MyCareer mode in the game as well as the park mode where you can play friends and other players online in a team.
customer_reviews.author: TJ/Jes

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you are playing with real players!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great, it looks so awesome, like I am in control of a game thats on TV. The game play is a little different, but in a good way!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rio

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My bother loves it and played it all the time. Me personally I don't understand what's fun of it but as longs as he's happy this gets a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ismaeldones

customer_reviews.title: delayed movements
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are great, the game is better than average... but unfortunately, i feel like I'm playing underwater... as there is a 0.2 second delay or so after trying to do some fancy moves.. Good game, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: love this game
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves sports games mostly football and basketball he said he loves this game for sports player wonderful game
customer_reviews.author: ms woods

customer_reviews.title: Not a good game
customer_reviews.text: I just hate sports games in general and the game makes people cringe, your guy talks like an idiot. I just bought the game to replace some cases that i broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game
customer_reviews.text: My Career is addicting to play. I like the RPG type of elements it has. The graphics are stunning and unbelievable at times. The gameplay is very fun and playing with buddies is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good game, but need to get use to the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Aperez12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's straight has glitches though but way better than live
customer_reviews.author: Frederick B.

customer_reviews.title: decent but takes long to load
customer_reviews.text: it's ok but it just solidified my age... i'm too old for video games lol
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Sweet game in till i lost connectivity too the servers yet it's a nice game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NBA 2k14 is the best
customer_reviews.text: NBA 2k14 is a game to remember and is the best looking game on the xbox one or for that fact any next gen console. the players new facial animations make you feel as if thought you are in the game with them feeling the emotion. the game is a sight to behold and a fun expreicene.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Online was kind of choppy. but the solo single players tight yo
customer_reviews.author: Sudzy1225

customer_reviews.title: Game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son that just bought the new Xbox one and he was very pleased that I got him this one and not the other basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: ... now it's stuck on 98% and my Wi-Fi is good and fast it's going on two hours now
customer_reviews.text: I was shock how fast it downloaded but now it's stuck on 98% and my Wi-Fi is good and fast it's going on two hours now ''
customer_reviews.author: MWhitaker

customer_reviews.title: Online issues!
customer_reviews.text: I love the series but the online issues with the servers made me put it away for sometime which is really unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Al-Najjar

customer_reviews.title: and for better and for worse
customer_reviews.text: If you skipped current-gen this year, it’s a no-brainer: yes, yes, yes, yes. Next-gen NBA 2K14’s ambitious new modes each leave a bit to be desired, and for better and for worse, it plays almost identically to the game you may already own. But this edition is not only a smooth-flowing piece of pro basketball simulation, it’s also one of the few games that makes a true next-generation leap in visual fidelity. And when you’re dropping $400-$500 on a fresh piece of hardware, there’s something to be said for that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best game the nba
customer_reviews.text: i played all game the 2k.. but this game its perfect, i dont know what spect of the future whit the nba video game.. i love this game
customer_reviews.author: hedigson2586

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: They made a great-looking game. They just forgot to make it fun. The controls really stink. Three stars. Try again.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Skimps out on game modes and features
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are really good. But it's just not the same game as the 360 version. It skimped out on lot of game modes and the only thing I was interested in doing - you can't start a season from where the current NBA season is at in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Max Stednitz

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the game! No issues with shipping! Got it in the mail when stated. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: NBA 2K14 is a awesome basketball game, with great graphics and a pretty good myplayer mode. Only complaint is that when the server goes down it does for days, and the myplayer rivalry with Ellis is a but dramatized.
customer_reviews.author: Brock R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my 13 yrs old son, he loves it and he plays it everytime. He likes basketball and does not joke with this game. I have already recommended it to friends.i
customer_reviews.author: vivian madu

customer_reviews.title: graphics are spectacular but game controls are no good.
customer_reviews.text: score a Basket is really dificult with this strange control using the analog pads.... graphics are spectacular but game controls are no good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Arango

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game brand new like stated. No problems with the game.Thanks Amazon for this game at that price. . .
customer_reviews.author: alberto colon

customer_reviews.title: This generation is just terrible
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good graphics. Cons: Almost everything else. MyGM mode - please, I can't even edit my roster at the beginning. No mention the ridiculous trading system they made. Steal - CPU players are all masters of steal, no matter what are their rates. Block - 6' can easily block a 7' from the back. I believe there is no competition in basketball video games. I start to play NBA live since 2000. Switch to 2K in 2007. Based on my 14 years experience. 2k14 is the worst overall. I think I'll skip 2k15. Please stop ruining the game, 2K.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and clear game that my son loves playing. We will definitely recommend it to others. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, Great graphics
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge basketball fan, but this game is very entertaining. Lots of options. Only dislike I have is not having the option on My Team to be able to pick up whatever players you want from an organized market.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Maciejowski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wow this could have been cool if I got it
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: More of the same
customer_reviews.text: Great looking game but 2K released a game with a ton of gameplay flaws. And ofcourse the online failures have been brought over from the last gen. Great job at failing to meet expectations 2K.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nba 2k
customer_reviews.text: Good game, but to many little things prevent it from being great. People talking without moving lips; why?? Walking through people like they are invisible; this is 2014 and many generations into this franchise.
customer_reviews.author: anon1999

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to it but great graphics and really brings alot of humanistic touches to the game. Sprint halftime is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: N8dogg8305

customer_reviews.title: Nba 2k14 its defiantly in the game!!
customer_reviews.text: Best sports game ever made, graphics are sick! You can't buy another game for next-generation that will just blow you away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The release of the shooting is not what I'm used to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: I really can't wait to see what more next gen has to offer in the following years for sports games as I have never really been into sports games until now.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: best of the best hands down
customer_reviews.text: You cant go wrong with Westbrook and Durant And that fast break offense Durant on the block easy two points
customer_reviews.author: Charles amos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was gift for my son. He loves basketball an its a great game for any fan. Great condition . Another great Amazon experiance
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Rickett

customer_reviews.title: 2k is the best
customer_reviews.text: It is the best basketball game out. The graphics are good and it is still better than nba live basketball.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Another great game by 2K.
customer_reviews.text: Create your own player is so much fun. I could play this game for hours and not get bored !!! Graphics are amazing on the next generation games.

customer_reviews.title: After about a week I couldn't connect to the servers ...
customer_reviews.text: After about a week I couldn't connect to the servers which wouldn't let me do much and kind of made the game pointless
customer_reviews.author: Justin Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The graphics were amazing and they really capture how the players would react in real life but some of the players stats were unrealistic
customer_reviews.author: ilan

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work online :(
customer_reviews.text: It's 2014, and online is a mess. My career is fun, my gm is okay. Otherwise, if it had servers that would handle players, I sold give it a 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It truly is a great game.
customer_reviews.text: Yes he loved it and plays everyday along with some of his friends. It is better than the one for Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Haire

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my husband who loves all the NBA 2K games. He was very pleased with the new game.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I play for bragging rights against my friends,
customer_reviews.text: That being said, my first game playing online there was no lag, and I dropped 41 with Lamarcus Aldridge, and I was like Online is dope. The very next game I lost by 18 or 20 and it seemed like the dude I was playing with had a mod or the lag was just perfectly timed for my failure. Like everyone else is saying, the server has been s*** ever since that very first game, and I just run off playing 1on1 or 2on2 with friends off-line. That's what 2k has been.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best 2k so far. Completely immersive myplayer mode. Tons of depth and an endless amount of customization. Not to mention insane visuals.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased... the graphics were amazing I would recommend this game ro any one who has the xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: erica duarte

customer_reviews.title: good game but not my type
customer_reviews.text: It just wast my type of game but ovarall game play was good if you are a fan of basket ball this is a game for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrendous rendition
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically feel the need to return video games but this one I'm making an exception. Just Google the bugs and glitches with this game. There's a mile long list of them and most are true and persist a month+ after the release of this game. I'd put the effort in to provide a better review but I thought I'd put in the equivalent effort into my review as effort put into developing this game.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing on the Xbox One, but is a little laggy.
customer_reviews.text: The best in the NBA 2K series so far, but not really more than an incremental yearly upgrade. I only bought it because of my new Xbox One. No noteworthy new features, but good expansion of existing features. MyCareer is the mode I have spent the most time playing so far, and it is addicting. Recommended to any new console owner as a showpiece for their new machine, or to fans of the game in general.
customer_reviews.author: Landles

customer_reviews.title: looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: 2k14 for xbox 360 is better with all the features.. Xbox one just looks way better but is really simple..
customer_reviews.author: Ontario

customer_reviews.title: Love 2K14, loved the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazon always gets my items to me on time! Love 2K14, loved the price. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Khyler Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: The game is full of bugs, frozen menus, and does not work as described at all. Basically this is a rip-off where the publisher takes your money and tell you to get lost. There is no support or documentation for issues that one might find either. I regret getting it and will never buy again any products from the thieves and thugs who developed this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Costa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just a great game. It looks absolutely outstanding on the One. Things have changed a bit with the right stick, you now being able to both do dribble moves with it and shoot, but it gets easier with time. Would recommend to any basketball fans out there!
customer_reviews.author: Evan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: This game has great graphics and good game play. I really like the blacktop mode. I recommend this game as the other NBA game for the XBOX ONE is not very good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: A lot to remember when playing but the game overall is fun. Just need to be more consistent with those buttons!
customer_reviews.author: Blade1

customer_reviews.title: Very enthusiastic "good" from my boys
customer_reviews.text: Very enthusiastic good from my boys. It was difficult at first but they worked through it. It does take a long time to load though.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyGirlzReadRZ

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was great. The game itself is a little bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was great. The game itself is a little bit of a let down. Limited features but cool graphics.
customer_reviews.author: MaximumLurch

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are incredible. 2K always does a great job. I can't believe I paid under $15 for this game.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great game mechanics!
customer_reviews.text: 2K really stepped it up. Controls on Xbox One are so smooth. I write this from my computer that is hooked up to the One, while I also play 2k14 at the same time. Great to have a next gen sports game!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: This game looks so good, you almost need to turn the resolution down to focus. All my friends told me there gonna buy it for their xbox one now. This game is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, but many issues by developers. Many charges get drawn lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Good game for any sports fan to play. Probably my favorite so far for the Xbox One system. Go Rockets.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: This game was shipped with the greatest speed ever! So thank you! Overall, NBA 2K14 is the best sports game I've ever played. 2k really did well on this mod regarding the gameplay, and executing on realism unlike never before in the franchises releases and pitiful attempts by EA Sports. The only sucky part is the whole VC scheme. I feel at times forced to buy VC in order to enjoy the other game modes beside Quick Matches. They definitely have work to do in that regard, but overall, the gameplay and graphics are breathtaking! I've never been a hardcore gamer, but I can definitely see this happening with 2k!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A+ for this Xbox one launch title
customer_reviews.text: This game is definitely one of the best launch titles for xbox one. I have played call of duty, assassins creed, Madden, and Ryse, and this title really stands out. Amazing game, a definite must-own launch title for xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyFresshh

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: The Graphics are incredible. The game is fully featured unlike a lot of launch games. The best looking sports game ever made. I love the new association mode, and I actually love the new virtual currency system.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R LaJoie Jr

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated 2K Fan.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the 2K franchise. I've bought everyone since Sega Dreamcast. They improve majorly by giving us a story line for Career mode and MYGM is pretty sweet as well. I would suggest improvement on the story line by giving us more roads to choose instead of having it basically all the same. I would also like to see improved player creation and voice overs. Maybe give us a choice of dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: NBA 2K14 - Xbox One
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox One

NBA 2K14
2K’s Visual Concepts studio, the team behind NBA2K14, has seen it all in the video game world. Founded in 1988, the team has experienced plenty of new gaming system launches over the years. But never one like the launch of PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Re-energized by the new systems’ technology, the seasoned team at VC has developed a completely new experience for next-gen NBA 2K14, featuring re-built game modes, a brand-new gameplay engine, and stunning graphics.




NEXT-GEN VISUALS
To truly take the game to the next level, to nail the thousands of interconnected details that create a next generation visual experience, artists had to change the way they work, starting with the materials that make up the NBA 2K environment: rubber, plastic, metal, and vinyl. In the past, artists would individually recreate each item, but now next-gen technology enables the team to build a library of materials with the correct index of refraction, reflection amount, and so forth. Everything in-game, from the scorer’s table and backboards, to human elements such as skin texture and sweat, was re-created to ensure the whole package lives up to next-gen realism.

View larger ECO-MOTION ENGINE
With Eco-Motion, the NBA experience comes to life in new ways: Crowd reactions, atmosphere, coaching strategies, real player voices, and, most of all, the emotion of the game. Player animations are dynamic, and evolve on the fly as you play. Player personalities and emotions factor into the game as well, affecting how players perform and behave on the court.

View larger NBA TODAY
NBA Today is a brand-new feature for next-gen NBA 2K14. Stats, videos, and scores, tied to the real NBA all-new ways. The focal point of NBA Today is the Daily Zap, featuring video from the previous day’s games delivered directly to your PS4 or Xbox One daily from NBA.com. Accompanying the Daily Zap, gamers can view the latest standings, scores, and top performers. The very same data used to adjust rosters using the new Dynamic Living Rosters system, all viewable 24 hours a day in NBA Today.

View larger MYGM
MyGM is a complete re-imagination of what a franchise mode should be, built exclusively for the next-gen consoles. Everything you say and do shapes the world around you as you oversee an entire organization, right down to the details of staffing, managing player expectations, game pricing, team facilities, and more. The decisions you make have ripple effects throughout the organization, both on and off the court. The Conversation Engine will remember everything you say, so each decision is vital to your success in both the short and long term.

View larger MYTEAM
MyTEAM returns in a new format. Earn, collect and build your ideal lineups to compete in tournaments, challenge online users in Road to the Playoffs, or take on actual NBA teams in the new Domination mode.

View larger MYCAREER
Live your career not only on the court but off the court too, with an all-new, player-driven narrative experience. There is a full cast of characters, endorsements from companies like adidas, Nike, and Gatorade, and branching-path storylines. Over 40 hours of gameplay await you in the first year alone. New to MyCAREER, when your MyPlayer needs a break from the grind of the NBA season, press conferences and commercial shoots, there’s a place you can go to play some pickup games with 100 of your closest friends.
feature_bullets: ECO-MOTION ENGINE - Ground-breaking, dynamic gameplay engine marries real life physics, player emotion and deep controls to deliver a seemingly endless variation of actions and reactions that can only be achieved with next-generation technology.
MyCAREER - Experience the NBA life like never before both on and off the court as you develop and hone your MyPLAYER through an epic and immersive branching story mode
THE PARK - An all-new, massive-multiplayer playground mode where up to 100 MyPLAYERs in a single Park can play street ball, socialize, watch games in progress, and more.

MyGM - A re-imagined franchise mode that takes grabbing the reins of team management to the next level. Create a GM, craft your management style through attributes, manage relationships with players and staff, meet goals set by owners and more in an attempt to earn a championship under your watch.
